statements: SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM GeneticData WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT id, genome_data FROM GeneticData WHERE disease_association = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, disease_association FROM GeneticData WHERE disease_association IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM GeneticData ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT patient_name, disease_association FROM GeneticData WHERE id = 500;
SELECT id, patient_name FROM GeneticData WHERE disease_association = 'Cancer' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, disease_association FROM GeneticData WHERE disease_association LIKE 'Diabetes%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, LENGTH(genome_data) AS genome_size FROM GeneticData WHERE LENGTH(genome_data) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM genome_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence, patient_id FROM genome_sequences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT variation_name, disease_association FROM genetic_variations WHERE disease_association IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, variation_name, sequence_id FROM genetic_variations WHERE sequence_id = 3;
SELECT id, variation_name, disease_association FROM genetic_variations ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM genome_sequences ORDER BY date_created DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, sequence FROM genome_sequences WHERE patient_id = 100
SELECT id, sequence FROM genome_sequences WHERE LENGTH(sequence) > 200
SELECT g.id, g.sequence, v.variation_name FROM genome_sequences g INNER JOIN genetic_variations v ON g.id = v.sequence_id
SELECT id, variation_name FROM genetic_variations WHERE disease_association IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM GenomeSequencingData;
SELECT patient_name, sequencing_date FROM GenomeSequencingData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT id, gene_name, variation_type FROM GeneticVariations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseAssociations WHERE association_score > 0.8;
SELECT disease_id, disease_name, association_score FROM DiseaseAssociations ORDER BY association_score DESC;
SELECT patient_name, sequencing_date FROM GenomeSequencingData;
SELECT gene_name, variation_type FROM GeneticVariations ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT disease_name, associated_variation_id, association_score FROM DiseaseAssociations WHERE association_score > 0.5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, sequencing_date, genetic_data FROM GenomeSequencingData WHERE sequencing_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, gene_name, variation_type, disease_name FROM GenomeSequencingData JOIN GeneticVariations ON patient_id = variation_id JOIN DiseaseAssociations ON variation_id = associated_variation_id;
SELECT * FROM GenomeSequences;
SELECT sequence_id, genetic_code FROM GenomeSequences WHERE sequence_length > 1000;
SELECT * FROM GeneticVariations ORDER BY variation_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, variation_type FROM GeneticVariations WHERE variation_description LIKE '%mutation%';
SELECT d.disease_name, gv.variation_type FROM Diseases d JOIN DiseaseGenetics dg ON d.disease_id = dg.disease_id JOIN GeneticVariations gv ON dg.variation_id = gv.variation_id;
SELECT * FROM GenomeSequences;
SELECT gene_name, variation_type, variation_description FROM GeneticVariations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT disease_name, disease_description FROM Diseases WHERE disease_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT variation_id, gene_name, variation_type, disease_name FROM GeneticVariations JOIN DiseaseGenetics ON GeneticVariations.variation_id = DiseaseGenetics.variation_id JOIN Diseases ON DiseaseGenetics.disease_id = Diseases.disease_id WHERE gene_name LIKE 'TP53%' AND disease_name = 'Breast Cancer';
SELECT sequence_id, genetic_code, sequence_length FROM GenomeSequences WHERE sequence_length > 1000 ORDER BY sequence_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenomeSequences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, sequence FROM GenomeSequences WHERE id = 3;
SELECT sequence FROM GenomeSequences WHERE date_added < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GenomeSequences ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT id, date_added FROM GenomeSequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%AGCT%';
SELECT id, sequence, date_added FROM GenomeSequences WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM GenomeSequences WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_added DESC
SELECT sequence FROM GenomeSequences WHERE id IN (2, 3, 5)
SELECT id, date_added FROM GenomeSequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%AGGT%'
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM GenomeSequences
